column2: it might not have been the best because we order our dishes randomly. I mean we ordered many dishes from scallop rock
column12: foie gras nigiri and to finish it with fried milk. The fried milk is awesome
column13: there so different textures and flavors all in one dish. You're suppose to eat a piece of everything on the plate all at one... you won't forget the experience and rave about it to everyone.
